ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module
ModMetaData.author: OskarPotocki, Sokyran, Kikohi
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer gives your late-game colonies a proper high-tech upgrade. The old Spacer module was starting to feel a bit dated, so this overhaul adds slick, high-tech furniture that actually feels spacer-worthy: like advanced beds, illuminated furniture, modern couches, air purifiers, giant TVs, and more. It’s all balanced to fit naturally into your colony’s progression, and fully compatible with existing saves. If you want your futuristic colonies to look the part, this is the mod for you.
